job description:
Need a Data Analyst with HealthCare (MedicAid) Experience for a 12+ Months Project in Pierre,SD Developing division reports as required. Developing division dashboards as required. Working with the analytics team to write queries, format and transform data, and pull back relevant data as needed. Read, interpret, and apply federal measure requirements to administrative claims data. Maintain and decipher claims information as needed for creating accurate and practical analysis.Preferred SQL experience and query logic SSMS preferred Report development utilizing Tableau or Power BI Familiarity with federal measure reporting standards. Dashboard development experience Proficiency in excel, including power-pivot and power query add-ons.Rate:$DOE - provided by Dice Data Analyst,Healthcare,Claims,Tableau,SSMS
Associated topics: data analyst, data engineer, data integrity, data manager, database, etl, erp, mongo database, sql, sybase
